alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:17AM CST until December 31 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle and snow causing travel impacts tonight... .As road crews continue to treat and widespread freezing drizzle has slightly eased, road conditions have slightly improved in spots primarily along major thoroughfares. Slightly icy conditions will continue into the morning hours especially on perpetually frozen elevated roadways as well as secondary, less- traveled roads. Freezing drizzle concerns continue into the morning hours before an eventual transition to snow from north to south through 6am. Light snow on top of ice becomes hazardous quickly, resulting in travel impacts through the morning, especially on elevated and secondary roadways. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and central, north central, southwest and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek
